hero.headline: Technology
hero.subtitle: We create human-centered automation that works quietly to improve people's lives. Accessible, empathetic, and trustworthy solutions that reduce stress and free your time.
hero.trustedBy: Trusted by teams who value people first

transform.label: Our Philosophy
transform.headline: Human-centered
transform.description: We believe technology should feel like relief, not complexity. Our approach puts people at the center of every decision.

empathy.title: Empathy First
empathy.description: We listen deeply to understand the real challenges people face, designing solutions that truly serve human needs.

innovation.title: Quiet Innovation
innovation.description: Technology should work seamlessly in the background, enhancing life without demanding attention.

trustworthy.title: Trustworthy & Clear
trustworthy.description: We believe in transparent communication and building lasting relationships based on reliability.

process.label: Our Process
process.headline: A gentle approach
process.description: We don't believe in aggressive timelines or overwhelming complexity. Our process is designed to feel natural, respectful of your time, and focused on lasting positive change.

step1.title: Listen & Understand
step1.description: We begin by truly understanding your challenges, your people, and your vision for a better way of working.

step2.title: Design with Care
step2.description: Solutions are crafted with empathy, focusing on what will genuinely improve daily experiences.

step3.title: Build Thoughtfully
step3.description: We develop with precision and care, ensuring every detail serves the people who will use it.

step4.title: Support & Grow
step4.description: Our relationship continues as partners, helping your solutions evolve with your needs.

testimonial1.quote: DOK7 didn't just build us software — they gave our team their evenings back.
testimonial1.name: Maria Santos

testimonial2.quote: Finally, technology that feels like it was made by people who actually care.
testimonial2.name: James Chen

testimonial3.quote: The gentlest transformation we've ever experienced. And the most effective.
testimonial3.name: Anna Kowalski

article1.title: The quiet revolution: automation that respects your time
article1.excerpt: How thoughtful technology can give us back the moments that matter most in our lives.

article2.title: Why empathy is our most important tool
article2.excerpt: Building technology that truly serves people starts with understanding their lived experience.

article3.title: Creating space for creativity in automated workflows
article3.excerpt: When routine tasks handle themselves, teams discover new possibilities for innovation.

wellbeing.title: Wellbeing Automation
wellbeing.description: Systems that free people from repetitive tasks, giving them time for what matters most in their lives.

intelligent.title: Intelligent Solutions
intelligent.description: Smart technology that learns and adapts, always working quietly in the background to serve you better.

trusted.title: Trusted Systems
trusted.description: Secure, reliable platforms built with transparency and care for your data and peace of mind.

team.title: Team Empowerment
team.description: Tools that bring teams together, fostering collaboration and genuine human connection.

cta.headline: Ready for technology
cta.subtitle: Let's have a gentle conversation about how we can help your team reclaim their time and focus on what truly matters.

floatingCTA.headline: Time back for what matters
floatingCTA.subtitle: Automate processes, simplify operations and reclaim valuable time to focus on what really matters.

hero.headline: Software solutions
hero.subtitle: At DOK7, we help free up time and energy so companies can focus on what really matters: the wellbeing of their teams and their growth.

why.headline: Why is it important?
why.description: Custom-made software improves productivity and allows you to solve unique challenges in your industry, giving you a competitive advantage.

productivity.title: Greater Productivity
productivity.description: Optimize processes and reduce time on repetitive tasks to focus on strategy.

competitive.title: Competitive Advantage
competitive.description: Unique solutions designed for the specific challenges of your industry.

personalized.title: Fully Customized
personalized.description: Software that adapts to your needs, not the other way around.

respectProcesses.title: We respect your existing processes
respectProcesses.description: We don't change your way of working. We create solutions that integrate naturally with your current processes, respecting what already works well.

efficiency.title: We increase your efficiency
efficiency.description: We automate repetitive tasks and optimize workflows so your team can focus on what really adds value.

focus.title: Focus on your team
focus.description: We create tools that improve your team's wellbeing, reducing stress and freeing time for personal and professional growth.

process.headline: Our work process
process.description: A structured and transparent approach to take your project from idea to successful implementation.

step1.title: Discovery and Analysis
step1.description: We deeply understand your business, processes, and challenges to design the perfect solution.

step2.title: Design and Planning
step2.description: We create a detailed roadmap with clear objectives and incremental deliveries.

step3.title: Agile Development
step3.description: We build your solution iteratively, with constant feedback and real-time adjustments.

step4.title: Implementation and Support
step4.description: We launch your solution with complete accompaniment and continuous support to ensure success.

cta.headline: Ready to transform
cta.subtitle: Let's talk about how we can help you create the perfect solution for your specific needs.

hero.headline: Software
hero.subtitle: We connect your systems and applications to work in perfect sync. Our expertise in integrations ensures your processes flow smoothly, improving operational efficiency and centralizing key information for decision-making.

problem.headline: What problem does it solve?
problem.description: Avoid errors in manual processes, optimize the use of your current tools, and reduce time wasted on redundant tasks.

automation.title: Complete Automation
automation.description: Eliminate manual work of transferring data between different systems.

centralized.title: Centralized Information
centralized.description: Make better decisions with unified data updated in real-time.

efficiency.title: Maximum Efficiency
efficiency.description: Optimize your processes and reduce human errors in data transfer.

crm.title: CRM & Billing
crm.description: Automatic synchronization between CRM and billing systems for seamless workflow.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce & Inventory
ecommerce.description: Integration of e-commerce platforms with inventory systems for real-time management.

productivity.title: Productivity & Management
productivity.description: Connection of productivity tools with project management systems for better collaboration.

synchronization.title: Real-Time Synchronization
synchronization.description: Keep all your systems updated instantly without manual intervention.

optimization.title: Process Optimization
optimization.description: Make the most of your existing tools with intelligent workflows.

reduction.title: Error Reduction
reduction.description: Minimize human errors by automating data transfer between systems.

process.headline: Our integration process
process.description: A proven approach to connect your systems securely and efficiently.

step1.title: System Analysis
step1.description: We evaluate your current technology ecosystem and identify integration opportunities.

step2.title: Architecture Design
step2.description: We create a robust and scalable integration plan tailored to your needs.

step3.title: Secure Implementation
step3.description: We connect your systems with best practices in security and performance.

step4.title: Monitoring and Support
step4.description: We continuously monitor integrations and provide proactive support.

cta.headline: Ready to connect
cta.subtitle: Let's talk about how we can integrate your systems to work in perfect harmony.
